title: Watch Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd reminisce about Back to the Future tech - Movies
text: Back to the Future stars Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd have reunited in a new commercial for Toyota, reminiscing about some of the best technology in Back to the Future. Talk turns to 3D movies, fingerprint technology and dog-walking robots, while Fox teases Lloyd for still owning a fax machine.The pair appear alongside each other just days ahead of the release of the Back to the Future 30th Anniversary Trilogy Blu-ray & DVD, which is out on October 21 - the exact date Marty McFly and Jennifer travel forward to in Part II.The Blu-ray package includes Lloyd's iconic scientist back in action in short film 'Doc Brown Saves the World'.The release will be accompanied by Back to the Future: The Complete Animated Series on DVD for the first time ever, and Back to the Future: The Complete Adventures, a combo of the trilogy and animated series with Flux Capacitor packaging.
